job.title: Sr. Data Engineer - Cloud Services
job.description: stronguAbout HashiCorpbrbrustrongHashiCorp is a fastgrowing startup that solves development operations and security challenges in infrastructure so organizations can focus on businesscritical tasks We build products to give organizations a consistent way to manage their move to cloudbased IT infrastructures for running their applications Our products enable companies large and small to mix and match AWS Microsoft Azure Google Cloud and other clouds as well as onpremises environments easing their ability to deliver new applications for their businessbrbrEngineering at HashiCorp is largely a remote team While prior experience working remotely isnt required we are looking for team members who perform well given a high level of independence and autonomybrbrstronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongCloud Analytics will enable the internal HashiCorp audience to discover access and leverage product data to derive intrinsic value that helps our business and customers grow In order to achieve this we are building a storage layer that acts as a onestop hub to store product data across the HashiCorp product suite and an access layer to facilitate data discovery and access We provide tooling and infrastructure to help our customers with a seamless onboarding and ramp up experiencebrbrstronguIn This Role You Can Expect TobrustrongulliDevelop construct test and maintain our Analytics platformliliDiscover opportunities for data acquisitionliliDevelop data set processes for data modeling mining and productionliliRecommend ways to improve data reliability efficiency and qualityliliContribute to the design and implementation of largescale systemsliliInterface directly with internal teams users and HashiCorp customersliliWork with multiple cloud platforms such as AWS GCP and AzurebrliulstronguYou May Be a Good Fit IfbrustrongulliYou have built or operated a real time analytics pipeline at scaleliliHave experience with tools similar to Segment Looker Heap RedShift RDSliliYou are familiar with microservice architectures and ideally have seen them in operation at a global scaleliliYou have prior experience working in high performance distributed systems while we strive to hire at a variety of experience levels this particular opening is not wellsuited for recent graduatesliliYou are able to knowledgeably discuss design and performance tradeoffs in complex systemsbrliulstronguAbout The Application ProcessbrbrustrongPlease note as communication is a critical aspect of how we work a cover letter is a great way to provide a sample of how you communicate In your cover letter describe why youre interested in working at HashiCorp and what draws you to this role in particularbrbrHashiCorp embraces diversity and equal opportunity We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills We believe the more inclusive we are the better our company will bebrbr
